code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate,useSearchParams}from"react-router-dom";import Movie from"./Movie";import{useMovies}from"../hook/useMovies";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Main(){const[searchParams,setSearchParams]=useSearchParams();const initialQuery=searchParams.get("query")||"";const[query,setQuery]=useState(initialQuery);const{movies}=useMovies(query);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{setSearchParams({query});},[query,setSearchParams]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-purple flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 w-full h-full pt-24",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-white text-xl",children:"Search for your next film to watch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"w-96 border-purple bg-blue-200 border-solid border-2 p-3 focus:outline-none focus:bg-white",type:"text",placeholder:"Search movies...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value)})}),movies&&movies.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"text-2xl pt-16 font-bold text-yellow",children:["We found ",movies.length," movies for you to choose \u27A1"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-4 justify-center align-top",children:movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Movie,{movie:movie,onClick:()=>navigate(`/movies/${movie.imdbID}?query=${query}`)},movie.imdbID))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-yellow text-regular mt-2",children:"No movies found yet."})]});}export default Main;
